dependencies: Terraform CLI (installed in Dockerfile; required_version ~>1.5.7 generated by live/terragrunt.hcl)
Terragrunt CLI (installed in Dockerfile; used by Makefile target plan: `terragrunt run-all plan`)
Terraform providers: hashicorp/aws (~> 3.0) and hashicorp/google (4.27.0) generated by live/terragrunt.hcl
Google Cloud SDK (installed in Dockerfile; sourced in entrypoint.sh)
architectural_resources: IaC tooling container image (cloud-tools) built/pushed via GitHub Actions (.github/workflows/ci.yaml)

AWS resources implied by remote state backend: S3 bucket for tfstate (bucket `${aws_profile}-terraform-state`) and DynamoDB table for state locking (`terraform-locks`) (live/aws-acme/account.hcl, templates/aws/account.hcl)
GCP resources implied by remote state backend: GCS bucket for tfstate (`${gcp_project}-terraform-state`) (templates/gcp/account.hcl)
AWS provider usage (hashicorp/aws) and Google provider usage (hashicorp/google) indicating AWS and GCP infrastructure targets (live/terragrunt.hcl)
